"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55130a5e6368723a314d2700#post_55130a5e6368723a314d2700
Really well! 

I just got up to the part with the stupid Assassin Ninja Guy (Who honestly look like a girl and I think just might be) And he punched him in the crutch by accident and he ran away!

Now I'm on some back story of when he finally noticed his training was getting him stronger. 

The story to this is really impressive! I'm loving it!
